level.heading: Borrowing of funds by Mayor.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to borrow funds from the United States Treasury in anticipation of the collection or receipt of revenues; provided, that each such borrowing is approved by the Council in advance of such borrowing by resolution.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-381.
